694820.name: Station 21 - Aeon Arise
694820.description:
Station 21 - Aeon Arise is changing the game entirely.
Not only will you be able to build space stations but you will also be able to explore a massive persistent universe where you can trade, gather materials for expanding and fight with enemies.

Aeon Arise makes it possible to build a ship docking module which allows you to undock from your station and explore the universe where you will be able to do thinks like trading materials, exploring systems, selling research and fighting ai.

Here is a list of extras with this DLC;

- Build ship modules
- Explore space
- Trade resources
- Fight AI Fleets
- Buy upgrades
- Travel across a massive persistent universe
- Build multiple stations


This is an exciting new light on Station 21 and we hope that you will support us through such a massive achievement to get to this stage.
694820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
